plan_details.Who all can be covered: ONE FEMALE / HUSBAND AND WIFE / UPTO 2A + 3C
plan_details.MID TERM INCLUSION: SPOUSE WITHIN 45 DAYS, CHILD WITHIN 90 DAYS

sub_limits.Room Rent/day: ANY ROOM EXCEPT SUITE OR ABOVE CATEGORY

renewal_benefits.No claim bonus: 20% FOR EVERY CLAIM FREE YR MAX 100%
renewal_benefits.Free Health Check-up: RS.1,000 TO RS.5,000 FOR EVERY YEAR

special_features_others.4: Rehabilitation and Pain Management Upto 10% OF SI
special_features_others.7: Motherâ€™s stay expense covered if Insured Child (<12 yrs) admitted in ICU (Single Pvt. AC Room)
special_features_others.8: Dependent child covered till 30 years if unmarried and dependent

maternity_cover.Delivery charges (NORMAL): AFTER 12 MONTHS RS.50,000 PER DELIVERY (MAX 2 DELIVERIES)
maternity_cover.Delivery charges (Caesarean): AFTER 12 MONTHS RS.50,000 PER DELIVERY (MAX 2 DELIVERIES)
maternity_cover.NEW BORN BABY COVER: DAY 1 COVER AFTER 12 MONTHS UPTO 25% OF SI
maternity_cover.Pediatrician Consultations for child: RS.500 PER CONSULTATION, MAX 4 TIMES (UP TO 12 YEARS)
